data.title: Solved: SSO between SAP netviewer portal and SAP BI4.0
data.meta_description: Solved: Hi Experts,   Need your  quick help to configure SSO between  SAP netviewer portal and SAP BI4.0. I am getting the below error when we try to open the reports. I
data.text:
Hello JRK,

1) we are not using Windows or Win AD SSO. But still we are getting AD error.

2)The url which you have given for SAP SSO is displaying down.

SAP Network Wiki is currently down.

Could you please let us know what i have to do for SAP SSO

seems like your web apps are not configured for SAP SSO

Please find the below list of changes which needs to be done on the web apps.

Kindly check the above given wiki on Monday.

For BI 4.0: Ensure the default system is selected inside of the SAP plug-in within the CMC

Modify Both the BIlaunchpad.properties and OpenDocument.properties files being used by the Web Application server (Default Tomcat location: <install dir>/webapps/BOE/WEB-INF/config/custom )

authentication.default to secSAPR3

Modify the global.properties file also in (Default location: <install dir>/webapps/BOE/WEB-INF/config/custom )

sso.enabled to true

siteminder.enabled to false

vintela.enabled to false

sso.sap.primary to true

Re-start the Web Application server for the changes to reflect.

Note: If there are no files in the custom directory you will have to copy them from the default directory

Below is the SAP note for the same. Please find the image for the flow.

1701240 - How to setup SSO for InfoViewApp/BILaunchpad and OpenDocument iView from SAP EP (netweaver...

Hope this solves your issue.

Hi Prasad,

i have configured Sso between BW 7.4 and BO 4.1.

LDAP Athenticationon without SSO (we dont have site minder).

Portal Integration and trusted athentication is configured using Query_String.

My Question is i am able to login bi launchpad without credentials but i am unable to open "open document" it is asking for credentials.

and if enduser wants use same open document through iview also it is asking for credentials.

Please help me to resolve the issue.

Here is the block diagram of landscape
